participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and active, Alex enjoys outdoor activities and loves trying new things.
participant_1.background: I am single. My favorite food is pizza. I am a cyclist. My father used to be a cop.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and social, Jamie loves to express herself through art and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix. I don't have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall. I am in 3rd grade. I live with my parents and my little brother.

content.text: Hi there, I'm participant_1.
Hi participant_2, I'm participant_2. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cycle, play soccer, and read. What about you?
I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix.
I've never heard of Asterix. What's it about?
It's a comic book series about a Gaulish warrior who fights the Romans. It's really funny and I highly recommend it.
I'll have to check it out. It sounds like something I'd enjoy.
I'm glad you think so.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to play soccer with my friends. We practice every week and we play in a league.
That sounds fun. I used to play soccer but I don't have time for it anymore.
That's too bad. It's a great sport.
Yeah, it is.
I also like to draw. I'm not very good at it but I enjoy it.
I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks. I've been trying to improve.
I'm sure you will.
Thanks.
So, what are you doing this summer?
I'm going to summer camp and I'm also going to start playing soccer again in the fall.
That sounds like fun. I'm going to be working this summer.
That's too bad. But it's good to have money.
Yeah, I guess so.
I'm excited for summer.
Me too.
